title: How to Draw Cute Animals

steps.headline: Draw a square.
steps.description: Add a crossed line at the center.

steps.headline: Draw a rectangle on the right bottom side of the square.
Draw the four legs of the tiger using small sharp angles.
steps.description: Add the tail at left upper corner of your rectangle.

steps.headline: Draw the ears using small triangles.
steps.description: Add the eyes using two small darkened circles. Leave a small white circular portion of the eye for the light’s reflection. Draw the nose using an inverted triangle. Draw the mouth using two small curves and add three horizontal lines on each side of the cheek for the whiskers.

steps.headline: Draw patterns on the tiger’s body.
steps.description: You can use small triangles for the pattern.

steps.headline: Draw a square.
steps.description: Add a crossed line at the center.

steps.headline: Draw a rectangle on the left bottom side of the square.
Draw the four legs of the lion using small sharp angles.
steps.description: Add the tail at left upper corner of your rectangle.

steps.headline: Draw the ears using small triangles.
steps.description: Add the eyes using two small darkened circles. Leave a small white circular portion of the eye for the light’s reflection. Draw the nose using an inverted triangle. Draw the mouth using two small curves and add three horizontal lines on each side of the cheek for the whiskers.

steps.headline: Draw the hair of the lion using small curved strokes.
steps.description: Make it look thick and furry.

tyn: Crayons, markers, colored pencils, or paints
text: A Cute Tiger Draw a square. Add a crossed line at the center. Draw a rectangle on the right bottom side of the square.  Draw the four legs of the tiger using small sharp angles. Add the tail at left upper corner of your rectangle. Draw the ears using small triangles. Add the eyes using two small darkened circles. Leave a small white circular portion of the eye for the light’s reflection. Draw the nose using an inverted triangle. Draw the mouth using two small curves and add three horizontal lines on each side of the cheek for the whiskers. Draw patterns on the tiger’s body. You can use small triangles for the pattern. Erase unnecessary lines.  Color your drawing.  A Cute Lion Draw a square. Add a crossed line at the center. Draw a rectangle on the left bottom side of the square.  Draw the four legs of the lion using small sharp angles. Add the tail at left upper corner of your rectangle. Draw the ears using small triangles. Add the eyes using two small darkened circles. Leave a small white circular portion of the eye for the light’s reflection. Draw the nose using an inverted triangle. Draw the mouth using two small curves and add three horizontal lines on each side of the cheek for the whiskers. Draw the hair of the lion using small curved strokes. Make it look thick and furry. Erase unnecessary lines.  Color your drawing.

A Cute Lion Draw a square.
Add a crossed line at the center.
Draw a rectangle on the left bottom side of the square.
Draw the four legs of the lion using small sharp angles.
Add the tail at left upper corner of your rectangle.
Draw the ears using small triangles.
Add the eyes using two small darkened circles.
Leave a small white circular portion of the eye for the light’s reflection.
Draw the nose using an inverted triangle.
Draw the mouth using two small curves and add three horizontal lines on each side of the cheek for the whiskers.
Draw the hair of the lion using small curved strokes.
Make it look thick and furry.
Erase unnecessary lines.
Color your drawing.
